node.title: Unidentified man seriously injured in Auckland motorbike crash
node.description: Police are wanting the public's help to identify a young man seriously injured last night in a motorbike crash in Weymouth.
node.content:
["Police are wanting the public's help to identify a young man seriously injured last night in a motorbike crash in the Auckland suburb of Weymouth.", "", "
Photo: RNZ / Richard Tindiller
", "The man was riding his motorbike when he crashed into a car on Damian Way at around 11pm last night, police said.", "", "
The man was wearing these shoes at the time of the crash. Photo: Supplied / Police
", "Police have been unable to work out his identity and are asking for anyone who recognises the description to contact them.", "The man, in a critical condition in hospital, is described as being of Māori or Pacific Island ethnicity, slim build and aged between 17 and 22.", "He has short black facial hair around the chin and top lip and has short black hair. He has a faint mole above his left eyebrow.", "The man is between five feet eight inches and six feet tall.", "He was wearing a black top with a Kathmandu puffer jacket, which is black on the outside and bright red on the inside, black Nike trackpants and grey Nike shoes, which have a red coloured-tick on the side. The shoes are size 10.", "Police urge anyone with information to contact them on 105, quoting file number 211223/0593."]
